sentences.english: This is the age of research, so there’s data to back this up.
sentences.chinese: 在这个研究当道的时代，我们有数据来证明这个观点。

sentences.english: Colored brights on the streets of Milan.
sentences.chinese: 米兰街头各种亮色当道。

sentences.english: When Dorian had finished the letter, he felt that he had been forgiven.
sentences.chinese: 当道连写完这封信后，他感觉自己已经被原谅了。

sentences.english: Dust coat be in power is popular to this one season trend the most advantageous wraparound .
sentences.chinese: 风衣当道是对这一季流行趋势最有利的概括。

sentences.english: Money talks here, demons walk here, ain't there any love around here?
sentences.chinese: 金钱挂帅，罪恶当道，难道这里没有爱存在吗？
